name: tm25
effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
